quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The title placement and wording are critical to confirming the addition of the title as specified in the instructions. Confirming the exact wording ensures accuracy.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the edited image contain the exact title “Today’s Balanced Lunch” at the top?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The presence and positioning of a placeholder for the school logo need to be confirmed. The location should specifically be in the bottom right corner as per the instructions.
quality_check_questions.question: Is there a placeholder for the school logo located at the bottom right corner of the image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Enhanced colors require the observation of brighter and more vivid hues compared to the original image. This verifies that the colors have been adjusted to appear visually enriched.
quality_check_questions.question: Have the colors in the food and background been visibly enhanced to appear more vivid and bright?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: White outlines around the edges of objects need to be observed clearly. Verifying this ensures that all edges in the image have been correctly outlined as instructed.
quality_check_questions.question: Are white outlines visible around the edges of all items on the plate in the image?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Formatting for an A4 vertical layout involves checking if the image dimensions align with A4 specifications, and whether text and image elements are appropriately paired within this layout.
quality_check_questions.question: Has the image been formatted to fit an A4 vertical layout, ensuring proper alignment of text and imagery?
